name: Knights of Tartarus
description: Knights of Tartarus is a role-playing game where you enter the underworld to fight off a legendary order of knights and save the world. To have a chance, you will need monsters to teach you their spells, craft items, solve puzzles and even compete against your rival.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Graphics: Integrated graphics card. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 180 MB available space
